name: Sheared
description:
Game Trailer on YouTube

Sheared is a shoot 'em up for crafty game for players of all ages. If you enjoy shoot 'em up gameplay, yarn crafts, and fluffy sheep, you will adore Sheared!

SHEAR!

Shear your colorful flock of sheep to collect wool.

CRAFT!

Use wool to create 100 yarn crafts and earn coins.

UPGRADE!

Spend coins to upgrade your clipper's power supply, blade power, and wool multiplier.

Features:

  • Classic shoot 'em up gameplay
  • Precise, responsive touch controls
  • Craft hats, mittens, socks, scarves, and sweaters
  • Colorful graphics, great sound fx, cute sheep, and fluffy wool particles
  • Earn over 100 achievements that award coins
  • Tablet support
